Name: Elham
description:
Elham began her business from a passion for greenery. She found that added color to life. She decided she wants to market them to others.

Her business is a home garden that is flourishing. When others come to buy from her she pairs them with one of her plants. Every plant has a place in her heart. For the house it becomes a throbbing life on the premises.

A loan will help her get fertilizer and help her plants grow. Bigger plants have a better chance of living.

She wants to make sure she sells her customers a lasting companion. Even in a conflict zone there is still the color green.
